description: Hi Jobseekers,<p><br></p>I hope you are doing well!<p><br></p>We have an opportunity <strong>C/C++ </strong><strong>Software Developer</strong> with one of our clients for <strong>Chicago, IL (Day-1 Onsite/Hybrid).</strong><p><br></p>Please see the job details below and let me know if you would be interested in this role.<p><br></p>If interested, please send me a copy of your resume, contact details, availability, and a good time to connect with you.<p><br></p><strong>C/C++ Software Developer</strong><p><br></p><strong>Location: Chicago, IL (Day-1 Onsite/Hybrid)</strong><p><br></p><strong>Type: Contract </strong><p><br></p><strong>Exp.:</strong> 9-10+ Yrs.<p><br></p><strong><u>Description</u></strong><p><br></p><strong>Job Summary:</strong><p><br></p>Generally responsible for the development, design and implementation of new or modified software products or ongoing business projects. Design, develop, document, test, and debug new and existing software systems and/or applications for market sale or large-scale proprietary software for internal use. Serve as technical expert on development projects. Participate in full development life cycle including requirements analysis and design. Write technical specifications based on conceptual design and stated business requirements. Support, maintain, and document software functionality. Identify and evaluate new technologies for implementation. Analyze code to find causes of errors and revise programs as needed. Participate in software design meetings and analyze user needs to determine technical requirements. Consult with end user to prototype, refine, test, and debug programs to meet needs.<p><br></p><strong><u>Primary Responsibilities</u></strong><p><br></p>Working closely with other developers, designers, business and systems analysts<p><br></p>Develop web applications and sites that engage and retain visitors.<p><br></p>Provide guidance on industry best practices, guidelines and governance for web applications and web sites.<p><br></p>Work closely with Quality Assurance to ensure end product is delivered with quality outcomes.<p><br></p>Perform benefit analysis for IT solutions and make recommendations for technology direction.<p><br></p>Researching, designing, implementing and managing software programs<p><br></p>Testing and evaluating new programs<p><br></p>Identifying areas for modification in existing programs and subsequently developing these modifications<p><br></p>Writing and implementing efficient code<p><br></p>Determining operational practicality<p><br></p>Developing quality assurance procedures<p><br></p>Deploying software tools, processes and metrics<p><br></p>Maintaining and upgrading existing systems<p><br></p><strong><u>Key Technical Skills</u></strong><p><br></p><strong>Programming Language:</strong> C/C++, Shell Scripting, AWK, Python<p><br></p><strong>Databases:</strong> MySQL, Oracle, RDS, Redshift<p><br></p><strong>Version Control</strong> : GIT, ADO<p><br></p><strong><u>Experience On Cloud Based Applications (preferably AWS)</u></strong><p><br></p><strong>Tools:</strong> GDB/DDD debugger<p><br></p><strong>Environments:</strong> Linux, WINDOWS<p><br></p><strong>AWS certification a plus</strong><p><br></p><strong>Thanks &amp; title: Senior Associate Software Developer (Full Stack)
description: <ul><li>Company with sports and technology at its core - over 4M active users|Lead mobile development of greenfield projects, build out your team<br><br><br></li></ul><strong>About Our Client<br><br></strong>Our client was founded over 20 years ago in the Spectator Sports industry, gearing their platform to serve a wide array of youth sports organizations across the US. They're currently the leading provider of technology solutions for all of the youth sports teams in the US, operating web and mobile platforms with over 4M on-boarded users. Their main challenge now is merging their technology to integrate with a company they acquired, while continuing to maintain operation of their platforms with minimal downtime. These are high impact projects that enrich the experiences of youth athletes, and simplify scheduling, planning, and making payments for parents!<br><br><strong>Job Description<br><br></strong><ul><li>Write clean, scalable code using React Native.</li><li>Remain up to date with development breakthroughs and follows best practices.</li><li>Use, rework, and adapt existing web applications for mobile apps.</li><li>Create and test software prototypes when needed.</li><li>Develop client displays and user interfaces in a Fullstack capacity.</li><li>Perform complete testing of web applications-unit and end-to-end automated testing, engaging users as necessary.</li><li>Develop SQL database-driven web interfaces.</li><li>Utilize front-end web technologies to create interactive user experiences with rich functionality.</li><li>Take charge of story development without needing micromanagement.<br><br></li></ul><em>MPI does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, marital status, or based on an individual's status in any group or class protected by applicable federal, state or local law. MPI encourages applications from minorities, women, the disabled, protected veterans and all other qualified applicants.<br><br></em><strong>The Successful Applicant<br><br></strong><ul><li>4+ years of Fullstack experience.</li><li>Prior team leadership experience.</li><li>Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field.</li><li>Boot camp certificate (with at least 2 additional years of experience).</li><li>Strong proficiency with React Native.</li><li>Experience using SQL databases - either relational and/or non-relational experience.</li><li>Experience working with REST APIs.</li><li>Strong attention to detail, always looking to create robust solutions that minimize excess redundancies.</li><li>Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills.</li><li>Clear documentation.</li><li>A desire to have an impact on the world with the software being developed.</li></ul><strong>What's on Offer<br></strong><ul><li>Base salary very open for the right candidate, in the range of 170k-215k depending on experience.</li><li>Affordable comprehensive healthcare plans, with more than 80% of out of pocket costs covered.</li><li>401k with 4% company match, no waiting period for matched contributions.</li><li>Unlimited Paid Time Off program, with no expectations, thresholds, or strings attached.</li><li>Person first model, i.e. you're a person before you're a developer allowing flexibility for when life just happens.</li><li>Dynamic culture, tech minded individuals looking to make a difference with their coding.</li><li>Mentorship, management, and leadership opportunities within.</li><li>Onboarding program to make the transition period run smoothly.</li><li>Optional outings to visit Chicago Sports teams, games, press events, networking events.<br></li></ul><strong>Contact: Jordan Kurth<br><br></strong><strong>Quote job ref: JN-062023-6093868</strong>

title: Jr-Business Analyst
description: We are actively partnering with a global diversified technology manufacturing company that is seeking a fully remote Sustainability Project Manager. The objective of this role is to enhance the company's Sustainability Footprint/Reporting with respect to the company's internal and external stakeholders. The ideal candidate will have strong project management experience within a large, global company. The Role: Provides project management support for annual sustainability disclosures Conducts research and benchmark review to help advise the company's sustainability reporting strategy Monitors key milestones and deliverables from global sustainability steering committee Manages engagement with ESG rating agencies to verify company information Supports IT general controls for ESG data collection software Supports data collection of environmental data into central software platform, conducts analysis of site progress, and supports site sustainability teams Manages a Sustainability Analyst You: 5 year of experience in sustainability, project management, quality assurance or supply chain ideally within a large global company Bachelor's degree required Excellent communication skills and high proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite 2 years of management experience Ability to travel Beacon Hill is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values the strength diversity brings to the workplace. Individuals with Disabilities and Protected Veterans are encouraged to apply. If you would like to complete our voluntary self-identification form, please click here or copy and paste the following link into an open window in your browser: https://jobs.beaconhillstaffing.com/eeoc/ Completion of this form is voluntary and will not affect your opportunity for employment, or the terms or conditions of your employment. This form will be used for reporting purposes only and will be kept separate from all other records. Company Profile: Founded by industry leaders to set a new standard in search, career placement and flexible staffing, we deliver coordinated staffing solutions with unparalleled service, a commitment to project completion and success and a passion for innovation, creativity and continuous improvement. Our niche brands offer a complete suite of staffing services to emerging growth companies and the Fortune 500 across market sectors, career specialties/disciplines and industries. Over time, office locations, specialty practice areas and service offerings will be added to address ever changing constituent needs. Learn more about Beacon Hill Staffing Group and our specialty divisions, Beacon Hill Associates, Beacon Hill Financial, Beacon Hill HR, Beacon Hill Legal, Beacon Hill Life Sciences and Beacon Hill Technologies by visiting www.beaconhillstaffing.com . We look forward to working with you. Beacon Hill. Employing the Future (TM)

The Role: Provides project management support for annual sustainability disclosures Conducts research and benchmark review to help advise the company's sustainability reporting strategy Monitors key milestones and deliverables from global sustainability steering committee Manages engagement with ESG rating agencies to verify company information Supports IT general controls for ESG data collection software Supports data collection of environmental data into central software platform, conducts analysis of site progress, and supports site sustainability teams Manages a Sustainability Analyst You: 5 year of experience in sustainability, project management, quality assurance or supply chain ideally within a large global company Bachelor's degree required Excellent communication skills and high proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite 2 years of management experience Ability to travel Beacon Hill is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values the strength diversity brings to the workplace. Individuals with Disabilities and Protected Veterans are encouraged to apply. If you would like to complete our voluntary self-identification form, please click here or copy and paste the following link into an open window in your browser: https://jobs.beaconhillstaffing.com/eeoc/ Completion of this form is voluntary and will not affect your opportunity for employment, or the terms or conditions of your employment. This form will be used for reporting purposes only and will be kept separate from all other records. Company Profile: Founded by industry leaders to set a new standard in search, career placement and flexible staffing, we deliver coordinated staffing solutions with unparalleled service, a commitment to project completion and success and a passion for innovation, creativity and continuous improvement. Our niche brands offer a complete suite of staffing services to emerging growth companies and the Fortune 500 across market sectors, career specialties/disciplines and industries. Over time, office locations, specialty practice areas and service offerings will be added to address ever changing constituent needs. Learn more about Beacon Hill Staffing Group and our specialty divisions, Beacon Hill Associates, Beacon Hill Financial, Beacon Hill HR, Beacon Hill Legal, Beacon Hill Life Sciences and Beacon Hill Technologies by visiting www.beaconhillstaffing.com . We look forward to working with you. Beacon Hill. Employing the Future (TM)

title: Java Developer / Data Engineer
description: Cooler Screens is backed and led by some of the most prominent Chicago &amp; Silicon Valley leaders, advisers, and investors and has developed a digital solution to transform a multi-billion dollar industry and positively affect the buying experiences of consumers in the US and beyond. If you’re looking to get on the ground floor of the next digital revolution and Chicago tech success story – this opportunity may be for you.<p><br></p>As the Enterprise Architect, you will drive our technology architecture to enable us to reimagine the digital in-store shopper experience as well as enable new retail merchandising and brand advertising capabilities. You will own the technical roadmap covering our in-store IoT solutions, cloud platform, and integrated 3rd party solutions. You will be a key decision maker and will be hands-on working with our engineering and design teams to adapt our solutions in a fast-paced start-up environment.<p><br></p><strong>Who You Are: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>You’re hungry for a challenging opportunity in a new start-up that is transforming the retail industry through re-imagining the in-store cooler surfaces. </li><li>You are a continuous learner and innovator who thrives on tackling tough technical challenges and finding ways to apply technology quickly to solve business problems. </li><li>You’ve recently been doing development and not afraid to jump into the code whether it’s Java, JavaScript (e.g. React), or other languages. </li><li>You’re familiar with good data architecture principles and know how to enable insights into the business. </li><li>You work well with small agile teams in a fast-paced environment and you’re a great communicator. </li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Qualifications: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Proven experience in building scalable, cloud-based architectures and integrating with third-party partners through well-defined APIs </li><li>An understanding of IoT technologies including sensor and edge computer solutions </li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Experience with the following: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Automated infrastructure (e.g. Docker, Puppet, Kubernetes) </li><li>PaaS (e.g. Azure Services) </li><li>Serverless computing (e.g. Azure Functions) </li></ul><p><br></p><strong>About Cooler Screens</strong><p><br></p>We are transforming retail cooler surfaces into IoT-enabled screens. Our media platform reimagines the brick-and-mortar shopping experience for consumers in the cooler and freezer aisle while delivering new marketing opportunities and smart merchandising for brands and retailers.<p><br></p>We have an excellent benefits package that includes medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, paid time off, and many other perks. Come join our fast-growing team at our headquarters in the heart of Chicago.<p><br></p>We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, native origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or veteran status.<p><br></p>Powered by JazzHR<p><br></p>gjuFbBefBu

title: C#/.NET Software Engineer
description: <strong>Summary:</strong> Looking for candidates who are willing to work on a one-year contract full time basis with the company. The candidate must be willing to re-locate themselves as per company requirements.<p><br></p><strong>Job Description:</strong><p><br></p>Entry level jobs are available to those candidates with little or no experience. Such positions provide training and the prospect of future advancement. Entry-level business analysts work under supervision and perform a variety of tasks including developing and maintaining various databases, generating reports, and receiving continuous training while working on a variety of projects.<p><br></p>The primary responsibility of an entry-level business analyst includes supporting data gathering and providing review and analysis of data. Other day-to-day duties include ensuring data integrity, participating in data quality control and validation, and producing requirements documents for various business development activities. An entry-level business analyst may also create and execute test scripts under supervision.<p><br></p><strong>Principle Duties And Responsibilities</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Interacts regularly and directly with the Operations function and has close user working relationship to ensure industry and best practices are employed</li><li>Develops intimate knowledge of business strategy, business model, and processes in order to identify improvement opportunities and value-added capabilities</li><li>Provides end-user support to a diverse, non IT-technical user base</li></ul><p><br></p>Powered by JazzHR<p><br></p>ML0BJfs2Kk

title: Business Analyst
description: <strong>Job Summary:<br><br></strong>This role performs and implements activities that impacts components / processes of specified functional areas of the Walgreens business software products OR Digital/Online application in an Agile environment. Work is typically received in short-term assignments that often require the application of independent judgment. Operates within the context of defined procedures that provide desired functionality to digital solutions, products and programs, typically for intermediary, basic to complex systems. Implements activities that influence entry to mid-level components of the functional area<br><br><strong>Job Responsibilities:<br></strong><ul><li>Writes code that meets specifications. Develops software applications and tools. </li><li>Completes programming and performs testing and debugging applications</li><li>Develops software applications and tools using Agile development methodologies. </li><li>Participates actively in the design, architecture and build phases, to aim at producing high quality deliverables, working with existing architects where appropriate. </li><li>Participates in the evaluation of compatibility of programs with existing communications hardware and software features. Develops professional expertise, applies company policies and procedures to resolve a variety of issues. </li><li>Works on problems of moderate scope where analysis of situations or data requires a review of a variety of factors. Exercises judgment within defined procedures and practices to determine appropriate action. </li><li>Builds productive internal/external working relationships. </li><li>Receives general instructions on routine work, detailed instructions on new projects or assignments. Usually works with some supervision, conferring with superiors on unusual or complex matters</li><li>Demonstrates proficiency in several areas of the professional function. </li><li>Has working knowledge of programming languages important to the organization</li><li>Effectively resolves problems and roadblocks as they occur. Has working knowledge of programming languages important to the organization. </li><li>Interacts with internal and external peers and/or managers to exchange semi-complex information related to assigned activities. </li><li>Acts as individual contributor as well as team member</li><li>Utilizes experience in order to identify problematic relationships. </li><li>Anticipates, prevents and eliminates problems and creates efficient fixes. </li><li>Gathers and updates necessary information and communicates to appropriate parties. </li></ul><strong>About Walgreens and WBA<br><br></strong>Walgreens (www.walgreens.com) is included in the U.S. Retail Pharmacy and U.S. Healthcare segments of Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (Nasdaq: WBA), an integrated healthcare, pharmacy and retail leader with a 170 year heritage of caring for communities. WBA’s purpose is to create more joyful lives through better health. Operating nearly 9,000 retail locations across America, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands, Walgreens is proud to be a neighborhood health destination serving nearly 10 million customers each day. Walgreens pharmacists play a critical role in the U.S. healthcare system by providing a wide range of pharmacy and healthcare services, including those that drive equitable access to care for the nation’s medically underserved populations. To best meet the needs of customers and patients, Walgreens offers a true omnichannel experience, with fully integrated physical and digital platforms supported by the latest technology to deliver high quality products and services in communities nationwide.<br><br><strong>Basic Qualifications<br></strong><ul><li>Bachelor’s Degree and at least 2 years of Engineering, Software Engineering or similar field experience OR High School/ GED and at least 4 years of Engineering, Software Engineering or similar field experience</li><li>Experience writing code for applications or automation</li><li>Experience with programming languages for online applications, microservices, APIs or mobile applications</li><li>Experience building, testing applications or automation</li><li>Knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle</li><li>Experience creating coding solutions to fix moderate problems/issues</li><li>Willing to travel up to 5% of the time for business purposes (domestically and/or internationally). <br><br></li></ul><strong>Preferred Qualifications<br></strong><ul><li>Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or similar field</li><li>Experience working in an Agile environment</li><li>At least 2 years of progressively complex related experience. </li><li>Experience identifying operational issues and recommending and implementing strategies to resolve problems</li><li>DevOps</li><li>2+ years of on experience is Deployment automation for various applications IaaS, PaaS platforms</li><li>2+ years of hands-on experience in automation software like Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Terraform or equivalent</li><li>Good knowledge of GIT workflows and Repo management</li><li>Excellent knowledge in implement of CI/CD pipelines for Cloud deployments using containers/Docker</li><li>Working knowledge of Kubernetes and microservices architecture and other DevOps tooling and Linux environments</li><li>Working knowledge or experience of software development for Web and Mobile applications in agile environments</li><li>Web/backend Developer</li><li>Previous experience with full stack development ranging from front-end user interfaces to back-end systems</li><li>Proficient in back-end languages like Java, Node/Typescript, .NET, Python etc. with exposure to performance optimization of high traffic &amp; scalable services</li><li>Hands on with modern UI frameworks like React with good knowledge of front-end design pattern (stateless components, conditional rendering, controlled components, hooks etc.)</li><li>Excellent knowledge of distributed SQL (e.g., Oracle, MySQL), NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra) design &amp; consumption patterns</li><li>Have an exposure to implementation, capacity planning &amp; performance tuning of Cloud technologies – Azure (ACS, AKS), Google, IBM, AWS or Cloud Foundry</li><li>Knowledge of software engineering best practices including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build process, testing &amp; operations</li><li>Mobile Developer</li><li>2 years of Mobile App development experience and hands on skills in Swift, SwiftUI, Objective C ( iOS)</li><li>2 Years of Mobile App development experience and hands-on skills in Kotlin ( Android)</li><li>Experience in building client applications consuming JSON based on APIs</li><li>Knowledge of software engineering best practices including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build process, testing &amp; operations</li><li>Software Engineer in Test</li><li>3+ years of experience as an SDET, Developer, or strong Automation Engineer</li><li>Experience developing automation in at least one OO language - Java, C#/C++, Python or web based technologies</li><li>Proven experience creating automation frameworks and tools to support test automation</li><li>Experience working in a Microservices based architecture in a cloud native environment</li><li>Data &amp; Analytics</li><li>2 years of experience in integrating, transforming and consolidating data from various structured and unstructured data systems for building analytics solutions in any cloud Platforms: Microsoft Azure, AWS or GCP</li><li>Experience with relational and NoSQL databases such as Cosmos, Cassandra</li><li>2 years of Experience in SQL, Java or Python programming</li><li>Experience in Data Pipeline and integration workflow management tools: Talend, Store Proc, Change Data Capture (CDC), Spark &amp; Azure API</li><li>Experience identifying operational issues and recommending fixes to resolve problems</li><li>Knowledge in Azure cloud technologies like Data Flow, Data Bricks, Azure Synapse, Power BI Analytics</li><li>Experience in any of reporting tools like Power BI, Business objects, Cognos or Tableau</li></ul>

title: Business Analyst
description: The Knowledge Management (KM) Business Analyst will support the KM team as the liaison between the core KM team, business units, IT delivery teams and leadership.<p><br></p><strong>WORK TO BE PERFORMED:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Interface with stakeholders to identify, analyze and research business needs.</li><li>Create documentation including business requirements, user stories, acceptance criteria, feature descriptions, user guides, process flows, and presentations.</li><li>Conduct analysis and research regarding best practices in the industry for KM frameworks.</li><li>Conduct analysis and research to define the internal knowledge estate at OCC.</li><li>Document current state and assist in future state design.</li><li>Conduct gap analysis to inform overall strategy and prioritization of work.</li><li>Define, clarify, and manage changes to scope.</li><li>Participate in development of knowledge tools and approaches.</li><li>Participate in solution evaluations.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>SKILL AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Minimum 3-5 years of experience in knowledge or information studies.</li><li>Strong understanding of KM principles and processes.</li><li>Good business process re‐engineering and project management skills.</li><li>Fluent in critical thinking, structured analysis, and problem solving.</li><li>Fluent in change management practices.</li><li>Proficient in breaking down knowledge and information silos.</li><li>Excellent listening, written and oral communication skills; skillful facilitator.</li><li>Good collaboration, relationship‐building, and customer support skills.</li><li>Proficient in SharePoint, Microsoft Office, Confluence and Jira.</li><li>Experience in ServiceNow a plus.</li><li>Experience with agile software development.</li><li>Bachelor’s degree.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Step 1<br><br>When you find a position you're interested in, click the 'Apply' button. Please complete the application and attach your resume. <br><br></strong><strong>Step 2<br><br>You will receive an email notification to confirm that we've received your application.<br><br></strong><strong>Step 3<br><br>If you are called in for an interview, a representative from OCC will contact you to set up a date, time, and location. <br><br></strong><strong>For more information about </strong>OCC<strong>, please click </strong>here.<br><br><strong>OCC is an Equal Opportunity Employer</strong>

title: Entry level Business Analyst
description: <strong>Job Description</strong><p><br></p>Entry level jobs are available to those candidates with little or no experience. Such positions provide training and the prospect of future advancement. Entry-level business analysts work under supervision and perform a variety of tasks including developing and maintaining various databases, generating reports, and receiving continuous training while working on a variety of projects.<p><br></p>The primary responsibility of an entry-level business analyst includes supporting data gathering and providing review and analysis of data. Other day-to-day duties include ensuring data integrity, participating in data quality control and validation, and producing requirements documents for various business development activities. An entry-level business analyst may also create and execute test scripts under supervision.<p><br></p><strong>Position Responsibilities</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Analyze reports to identify operational issues.</li><li>Conduct ad hoc analyses on specific areas of the operation.</li><li>Develop recommendations to improve performance.</li><li>Manage small operational process improvement projects.</li><li>Maintain databases and develop reports.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Minimum Requirements</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Master’s degree.</li><li>Microsoft Office experience.</li><li>Excellent communication and organizational skills.</li></ul><p><br></p>Powered by JazzHR<p><br></p>xAVLthtO2X

designs, and affect change</li><li>Must be open to relocate</li><li>Proficient with Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint (databases and knowledge of SQL is also preferred)</li></ul><p><br></p>Staffigo title: Entry level Business Analyst
description: <strong>Job summary:</strong> <p><br></p>The entry level Business Analyst’s role is to assist with the plan, design, develop, and launch efficient information systems and operations systems in support of core organizational functions. Using both business and technical skills, the Business Analyst works directly with customers to identify business requirements with sufficient detail and clarity to proposals for solutions. This individual will apply proven communication, analytical and problem-solving skills to help identify, communicate and resolve systems issues to maximize the benefit of IT systems investments.<p><br></p><strong>Responsibilities</strong><p><br></p><em><strong>Strategy &amp; Planning</strong></em><p><br></p><ul><li>Assist in the planning, design and development of new applications and enhancements to existing applications.</li><li>Meet with decision makers, systems owners, and end-users to define business requirements and systems goals, and identify and resolve business systems issues.</li><li>Ensure compatibility and interoperability of in-house computing systems.</li><li>Review and analyze the effectiveness and efficiency of existing systems and develop strategies for improving or further leveraging these systems.</li></ul><p><br></p> <strong>Acquisition &amp; Deployment</strong> <p><br></p><ul><li>Assist in the deployment of new applications and enhancements to existing applications.</li><li>Create system design proposals.</li><li>Perform cost-benefit and return on investment analyses for proposed systems to aid management in making implementation decisions.</li><li>Create systems models, specifications, diagrams and charts to provide direction to system programmers.</li><li>Coordinate and perform in-depth tests, including end-user reviews, for modified and new systems.</li><li>Provide orientation and training to end-users for all modified and new systems.</li><li>Other duties as assigned.</li></ul><p><br></p>Powered by JazzHR<p><br></p>oyANNkGQuA

This individual will apply proven communication, analytical and problem-solving skills to help identify, communicate and resolve systems issues to maximize the benefit of IT systems investments.<p><br></p><strong>Responsibilities</strong><p><br></p><strong><em>Strategy &amp; Planning</em></strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Assist in the planning, design and development of new applications and enhancements to existing applications.</li><li>Meet with decision makers, systems owners, and end-users to define business requirements and systems goals, and identify and resolve business systems issues.</li><li>Ensure compatibility and interoperability of in-house computing systems.</li><li>Review and analyze the effectiveness and efficiency of existing systems and develop strategies for improving or further leveraging these systems.</li></ul><p><br></p> <strong>Acquisition &amp; Deployment</strong> <p><br></p><ul><li>Assist in the deployment of new applications and enhancements to existing applications.</li><li>Create system design proposals.</li><li>Perform cost-benefit and return on investment analyses for proposed systems to aid management in making implementation decisions.</li><li>Create systems models, specifications, diagrams and charts to provide direction to system programmers.</li><li>Coordinate and perform in-depth tests, including end-user reviews, for modified and new systems.</li><li>Provide orientation and training to end-users for all modified and new systems.</li><li>Other duties as assigned.</li></ul><p><br></p>Powered by JazzHR<p><br></p>8QntDwdDXu

title: Entry Level Business Analyst
description: <strong>About The Company</strong><p><br></p>ISG Data Platform is a cutting-edge technology company focused on developing innovative solutions in the machine learning area. We are a dynamic and forward-thinking team dedicated to revolutionizing the industry.<p><br></p><strong>Job Summary</strong><p><br></p>We are seeking passionate Full Stack Developers to join our team and support the development of products in the machine learning domain. As a Full Stack Developer, you will contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of our data platform, ensuring high-quality code and optimal system performance. This is an excellent opportunity for individuals with a strong background in Java, relational databases, REST APIs, and AWS to work on exciting projects and be part of a collaborative and growth-oriented environment.<p><br></p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and understand requirements for new features and system enhancements.</li><li>Design, develop, test, and deploy scalable and efficient software solutions using Java 8, Spring Boot, and other relevant technologies.</li><li>Implement and maintain RESTful APIs for seamless integration of various components and services.</li><li>Utilize relational databases (e.g., Postgres, Aurora) to design and optimize data models for efficient data retrieval and storage.</li><li>Work with AWS services, such as EC2, S3, Lambda, and DynamoDB, to deploy and manage scalable cloud-based applications.</li><li>Conduct Java code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices.</li><li>Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.</li><li>Troubleshoot and debug issues, identify root causes and implement appropriate solutions.</li><li>Perform unit testing and participate in system integration testing to ensure the reliability and robustness of the applications.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Required Skills and Qualifications:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Strong proficiency in Java 8, with a deep understanding of object-oriented programming principles.</li><li>Experience working with relational databases, such as Postgres or Aurora, including data modeling and query optimization.</li><li>Solid understanding of RESTful API development and experience with frameworks like Spring Boot.</li><li>Hands-on experience with AWS services, particularly EC2, S3, Lambda, and DynamoDB.</li><li>Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and Agile development methodologies.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Preferred Skills:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Experience with Spring Data and other Spring framework components.</li><li>Familiarity with caching technologies like Redis or Memcached.</li><li>AWS certification, such as AWS Certified Developer - Associate or AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate.</li></ul><p><br></p>Additional Information:<p><br></p><ul><li>This is a full-time position based in the United States. Remote work options may be available.</li><li>A Java test will be part of the interview process.</li></ul>

title: Entry level Business Analyst
description: Business analysts are sometimes referred to as management analysts, business continuity planners or business operations specialists. A business analyst identifies and analyzes an organization's business processes for the purposes of building a software application or platform, improving productivity, minimizing risk or waste, or developing a new product or service line. Business analysts must interface with several departments and job titles to glean information about how a process operates, and analysts are often involved in high-level discussions with company owners, clients, upper management and other important stakeholders.<p><br></p><strong>FOR MORE INFORMATION PLEASE CALL: 773 770 6307</strong><p><br></p><strong>Email: denver@staffigo.com</strong><p><br></p><strong>Job Description/Responsibilities:</strong><p><br></p><strong>Strategy &amp; Planning</strong><p><br></p>Assist in the planning, design and development of new applications and enhancements to existing applications.<p><br></p>Meet with decision makers, systems owners, and end-users to define business requirements and systems goals, and identify and resolve business systems issues.<p><br></p>Ensure compatibility and interoperability of in-house computing systems.<p><br></p>Review and analyze the effectiveness and efficiency of existing systems and develop strategies for improving or further leveraging these systems.<p><br></p><strong>Acquisition &amp; Deployment</strong><p><br></p>Assist in the deployment of new applications and enhancements to existing applications.<p><br></p>Create system design proposals.<p><br></p>Perform cost-benefit and return on investment analyses for proposed systems to aid management in making implementation decisions.<p><br></p>Create systems models, specifications, diagrams and charts to provide direction to system programmers.<p><br></p>Coordinate and perform in-depth tests, including end-user reviews, for modified and new systems.<p><br></p>Provide orientation and training to end-users for all modified and new systems.<p><br></p>Other duties as assigned.<p><br></p><strong>Qualifications:</strong><p><br></p>Master’s Degree in Information Technology.<p><br></p>Must have good knowledge in Finance, Banking, Insurance, Retail or Healthcare and/or benefit administration is a plus.<p><br></p><strong>Excellent Writing/documentation, Communication, Analysis And Organizational Skills Required.</strong><p><br></p>Strong aptitude in both business and technology.<p><br></p>Self-starter with excellent organizational and time management skills.<p><br></p>Fast learner, quality consciousness and committed to deadlines.<p><br></p>Powered by JazzHR<p><br></p>XPesUOQqGf

title: Entry level Business Analyst
description: <strong>Key Responsibilities:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Analyzes business requirements to understand the business needs and to determine how systems and applications can best functionally fulfill those needs</li><li>Combines knowledge of what the business wants with knowledge of how the systems are built and used to create a functional design and write user stories for a given application</li><li>Serve as the primary liaison between the Business, Architecture, Development and Testing teams throughout the project life cycle</li><li>Schedule and lead requirements /JAD sessions with stakeholders; gather testable system requirements and translate them into use cases in Functional Specification Documents and user stories</li><li>Conducts in-depth research to determine if solutions to business requirements currently exist within or outside the business unit, and if not, whether new effective solutions are feasible</li><li>Analyzes impact of proposed solution to develop use cases to demonstrate the business requirements to the IT (Information Technology) Team and Quality Assurance Team</li><li>Work closely with the Integration System Test team to ensure all identified scenarios are properly tested and defects are resolved and a quality end user product is delivered</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Requirements:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Demonstrated professional work experience in hand's on Application Development and/or Engineering role</li><li>Must have excellent communication, interpersonal, and analytical skills</li><li>Must have the ability easily assimilate information and learn new applications and processes</li><li>Demonstrated experience in Agile SDLC</li><li>Knowledge of Microsoft Office tools like MS Word, MS Excel, and MS PowerPoint</li><li>Knowledge of process flow charting tools like Visio</li><li>Must have a solid ability to analyze complex system requirements and present findings to both internal and external stakeholders in a simple and comprehensible manner</li><li>Must have excellent writing skills, with solid experience in writing functional and technical specification documents and detailed user stories</li><li>Must have an excellent ability to multi-task effectively working on several projects synchronously</li></ul><p><br></p>Powered by JazzHR<p><br></p>YGvdPgtDWJ

description: <strong>Key Responsibilities:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Analyzes business requirements to understand the business needs and to determine how systems and applications can best functionally fulfill those needs</li><li>Combines knowledge of what the business wants with knowledge of how the systems are built and used to create a functional design and write user stories for a given application</li><li>Serve as the primary liaison between the Business, Architecture, Development and Testing teams throughout the project life cycle</li><li>Schedule and lead requirements /JAD sessions with stakeholders; Entry-level business analysts work under supervision and perform a variety of tasks including developing and maintaining various databases, generating reports, and receiving continuous training while working on a variety of projects.<p><br></p>The primary responsibility of an entry-level business analyst includes supporting data gathering and providing review and analysis of data. title: Full Stack Software Engineer 10+ On Site
description: We are hiring a software developer to focus on dqlite, our distributed SQLite database which uses our own Raft library for establishing consensus and replication. Dqlite is available as a pure C library or through a Go package that we also maintain, and we intend to provide bindings for Python and other languages.<p><br></p>You will design and implement enhancements to the libraft, dqlite and go-dqlite components which we consume in MicroK8s, LXD and other projects. Work includes development in those pieces of software as well as responding to issues and user inquiries.<p><br></p>This is an excellent opportunity for someone who wants to have a meaningful impact on modern computing technologies. Canonical offers a fast-paced team environment and a career full of learning and development opportunities.<p><br></p>What you will do<p><br></p><ul><li>Design and implement features across dqlite</li><li>Debug and fix issues encountered by your users</li><li>Improve Jepsen tests, traditional HA database automated testing and stress tests</li><li>Participate in our engineering process through code and architectural review</li><li>Engage with the open source community and commercial partners</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Valuable Skills And Experience</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Experience with distributed systems (preferably with Raft)</li><li>Good C programming experience</li><li>Solid understanding of asynchronous programming and concurrency patterns a plus</li><li>Capacity to learn quickly about new systems and techniques</li><li>Strong written and verbal communication skills</li><li>Bachelor's or equivalent in Computer Science, STEM or similar degree</li></ul><p><br></p>Canonical is a growing international software company that works with the open-source community to deliver Ubuntu, the world's best free software platform. Our services help businesses worldwide to reduce costs, improve efficiency and enhance security with Ubuntu.<p><br></p>We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.<p><br></p>#Stack<p><br></p>

Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.<p><br></p>#Stack<p><br></p>

title: Junior Business Analyst
description: <strong>The Business Analyst</strong> must have a basic understanding of technology and financial terms. The Analyst must also understand principles in business modeling and requirements definition. Basic skills with moderate level of proficiency. Has a general understanding of principles in business modeling and requirements definition, one or products/services, and at least one systems development life cycle model. Generally performs single-function tasks that tend to be of small to moderate size and scope. Works under close to moderate supervision with limited latitude for independent judgment. Consults with senior peers on non-complex projects to learn through experience.<p><br></p><strong>FOR MORE INFORMATION PLEASE CALL: 773 770 6307</strong><p><br></p><strong>Email: denver@staffigo.com</strong><p><br></p><strong>Roles and Responsibilities:</strong><p><br></p>The applicant will manage the asset database including: Automated discovery, Replenishment roadmap, Capacity roadmap, and Maintenance planning.<p><br></p>Devises or modifies procedures to solve complex problems considering computer equipment capacity and limitations, operation time and form of desired results.<p><br></p>Includes analysis of business and user needs, documentation of requirements and translation into proper system requirement specifications.<p><br></p>Influences business partners and service providers regarding priorities, hardware/software selection and/or vendor selection.<p><br></p>Analyzes marketplace, industry, company, technology trends and best practices, vendor products and services, etc.<p><br></p>Identifies and documents business strategies, objectives, and drivers.<p><br></p>Analyzes and documents business processes and metrics, and identifies improvement opportunities.<p><br></p>Re-engineers processes to deliver greater effectiveness and efficiency.<p><br></p><strong>Qualifications:</strong><p><br></p>Master’s Degree in IT / Closely related field.<p><br></p>Must have good knowledge in Finance, Banking, Insurance, Retail or Healthcare and/or benefit administration is a plus.<p><br></p><strong>Excellent Writing/documentation, Communication, Analysis And Organizational Skills Required.</strong><p><br></p>Strong aptitude in both business and technology.<p><br></p>Self-starter with excellent organizational and time management skills.<p><br></p>Fast learner, quality consciousness and committed to deadlines.<p><br></p>Powered by JazzHR<p><br></p>DbBPmFyIrC

title: Specialist - Software Engineering
description: <strong>Job Description</strong><p><br></p>As an Entry-Level Business Data Analyst, you will be an internal consultant and focus on transforming data into actionable business insights to fuel the growth of Staffigo. Data is at the heart of every decision made within Staffigo, and our analytics team works to solve problems across a wide variety of topics.<p><br></p><strong>Job Requirements: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>A great attitude and hunger for learning.</li><li>Excellent analytical, written and oral communication skills.</li><li>Flexibility and ability to deal with ambiguity.</li><li>Ability to work within a team environment.</li><li>Ready to give commitment for at least 1 year.</li><li>Strong work ethic, integrity, customer service and communication skills.</li><li>Proficient in MS-Office</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Qualification:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Masters (Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Finance, Business, Science, Health Care)</li></ul><p><br></p>Powered by JazzHR<p><br></p>BBZxSV0E3d

title: Opening for Sr.Net Developer -- Chicago, IL (Hybrid)
description: We are back with another job ad! It's the same stealth mode start up we're working with but this time they're looking for a React Native Engineer to work on their mobile blockchain wallet. Wallet is used to encourage their users to participate on their platform as they get rewarded the more they engage with the application. This platform will influence culture as people are able to be monetized for their curation.<p><br></p>Similarly, the remote is 100% remote for those located within Chicago and Chicagoland area as they continue to build their presence within the city. It's still in stealth mode as they are planning to launch later in Q3. If blending the mixture between culture and crypto is something that excites you then submit your information!<p><br></p><strong>Required Skills &amp; Experience</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>5 years of experience working with React Native </li><li>Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field </li><li>Experience working with Blockchain </li></ul> Desired Skills &amp; Experience<p><br></p><ul><li>Past experience working in a startup </li><li>Ability to apply feedback </li><li>Able to collaborate between team members </li></ul> What You Will Be Doing Tech Breakdown<p><br></p><ul><li>100% React Native </li></ul> Daily Responsibilities<p><br></p><ul><li>70% Hands On </li><li>30% Team Collaboration </li></ul> The Offer You will receive the following benefits:<p><br></p><ul><li>Medical Insurance </li><li>Dental Benefits </li><li>Vision Benefits </li><li>Paid Time Off (PTO) </li></ul> Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future.

title: Entry Level Business Analyst
description: <strong>Job Summary:<br><br></strong>This role performs and implements activities that impacts components or processes of specified functional areas of the Walgreens business software products OR Digital or Online application in an Agile environment. Work is typically received in short term assignments that often require the application of independent judgment. Operates within the context of defined procedures that provide desired functionality to digital solutions, products and programs, typically for intermediary, basic to complex systems. Implements activities that influence entry to mid level components of the functional area.<br><br><strong>Job Responsibilities:<br></strong><ul><li>Writes code that meets specifications. Develops software applications and tools. </li><li>Completes programming and performs testing and debugging applications</li><li>Develops software applications and tools using Java or React JS and Agile development methodologies. </li><li>Actively designs, architectures and builds phases utilizing Java or React JS to aim at producing high quality deliverables, working with existing architects where appropriate. </li><li>Evaluates compatibility of programs with existing communications hardware and software features. Develops professional expertise, applies company policies and procedures to resolve a variety of issues. </li><li>Works on problems where analysis of situations or data requires a review of a variety of factors. Exercises judgment to determine appropriate action. </li><li>Builds productive internal or external working relationships. </li><li>Demonstrates proficiency in several areas of the professional function. </li><li>Has working knowledge of programming languages important to the organization, including Java or React JS. </li><li>Effectively resolves problems and roadblocks as they occur. Has working knowledge of programming languages important to the organization. </li><li>Interacts with internal and external peers and or managers to exchange semi-complex information related to assigned activities. </li><li>Acts as individual contributor as well as team member</li><li>Utilizes experience in order to identify problematic relationships. </li><li>Anticipates, prevents and eliminates problems and creates efficient fixes. </li><li>Gathers and updates necessary information and communicates to appropriate parties. </li></ul><strong>About Walgreens and WBA<br><br></strong>Walgreens (www.walgreens.com) is included in the U.S. Retail Pharmacy and U.S. Healthcare segments of Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (Nasdaq: WBA), an integrated healthcare, pharmacy and retail leader with a 170-year heritage of caring for communities. WBA’s purpose is to create more joyful lives through better health. Operating nearly 9,000 retail locations across America, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands, Walgreens is proud to be a neighborhood health destination serving nearly 10 million customers each day. Walgreens pharmacists play a critical role in the U.S. healthcare system by providing a wide range of pharmacy and healthcare services, including those that drive equitable access to care for the nation’s medically underserved populations. To best meet the needs of customers and patients, Walgreens offers a true omnichannel experience, with fully integrated physical and digital platforms supported by the latest technology to deliver high-quality products and services in communities nationwide.<br><br><strong>Basic Qualifications<br></strong><ul><li>Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or similar field and at least 2 years of professional work experience in Engineering, Software Engineering or similar field</li><li>Experience working with React Js and or Java</li><li>Proficient in back end languages, such as Java, Node or Typescript, Dot NET, Python etc with exposure to performance optimization of high traffic and scalable services</li><li>Knowledge of software engineering best practices including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build process, testing and operations</li><li>Experience writing code for applications or automation</li><li>Experience with programming languages for online applications, microservices, apis or mobile applications</li><li>Experience building ,testing applications or automation</li><li>Knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle</li><li>Experience creating coding solutions to fix moderate problems or issue</li><li>Willing to travel up to or at least 10% of the time for business purposes (within state and out of state). <br><br></li></ul><strong>Preferred Qualifications<br></strong><ul><li>Experience with full stack development ranging from front end user interfaces to back end systems</li><li>Hands on with modern ui frameworks like React with good knowledge of front end design pattern (stateless components, conditional rendering, controlled components, hooks etc.)</li><li>Excellent knowledge of distributed SQL (example, Oracle, MySQL), NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra) design and consumption patterns</li><li>Experience with implementation, capacity planning and performance tuning of Cloud technologies Azure (ACS, AKS), Google, IBM, AWS or Cloud Foundry</li><li>Experience in a retail digital ecommerce space</li></ul>

title: Junior Business Analyst
description: <strong><u>" Job Title</u></strong><p><br></p>"ALL our jobs are US based and candidates must be in the US with valid US Work Authorization. Please apply on our website directly.<p><br></p>Software Developer Location:<p><br></p>Chicago, IL (hybrid - must be onsite 4X a month) 12-month Contract<p><br></p>Back-end Batch revenue management system Forecasting and optimization 3-5 years of experience<p><br></p>Mid-level candidate<p><br></p>Not looking for a Senior level candidate Must be comfortable with hands on coding (some new code, updating current code) C is the most important and mandatory, looking for a candidate that has experience doing Batch development C++, Shell scripting (batch), Linux, AWS environment Python nice to have.<p><br></p>Job Summary: Generally responsible for the development, design and implementation of new or modified software products or ongoing business projects. Design, develop, document, test, and debug new and existing software systems and/or applications for market sale or large-scale proprietary software for internal use. Serve as technical expert on development projects. Participate in full development life cycle including requirements analysis and design. Write technical specifications based on conceptual design and stated business requirements. Support, maintain, and document software functionality. Identify and evaluate new technologies for implementation. Analyze code to find causes of errors and revise programs as needed. Participate in software design meetings and analyze user needs to determine technical requirements. Consult with end user to prototype, refine, test, and debug programs to meet needs.<p><br></p>Primary Responsibilities: Working closely with other developers, designers, business and systems analysts Develop web applications and sites that engage and retain visitors. Provide guidance on industry best practices, guidelines and governance for web applications and web sites. Work closely with Quality Assurance to ensure end product is delivered with quality outcomes. Perform benefit analysis for IT solutions and make recommendations for technology direction. Researching, designing, implementing and managing software programs Testing and evaluating new programs Identifying areas for modification in existing programs and subsequently developing these modifications Writing and implementing efficient code Determining operational practicality Developing quality assurance procedures Deploying software tools, processes and metrics Maintaining and upgrading existing systems<p><br></p><strong><u>Key Technical Skills</u></strong><p><br></p>Programming Language: C/C++, Shell Scripting, AWK, Python<p><br></p>Databases: MySQL, Oracle, RDS, Redshift<p><br></p>Version Control : GIT, ADO<p><br></p>Experience on Cloud based applications (preferably AWS)<p><br></p>Tools: GDB/DDD debugger<p><br></p>Environments: Linux, WINDOWS<p><br></p>AWS certification a plus
